suppress.notes: Doesn't apply to this project. Reference: https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/reference/html/integration.html#remoting-httpinvoker
Only affects Amazon Corretto when hot patch is enabled
False Positives https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-34047 affects GraphQL library that we don't use in this project
version greater than spring boot 3.2 needed
False positive: Jackson community does not consider this a security issue (https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/3972) Wait for spring boot upgrades
